name: Blik's Radical Adventure
description:
Blik's Radical Adventure is a highly addicting, radical top down shooter, high score chasing shoot em up.

Features:

5 weapons

Pistol

Shotgun

Machine Gun

Wand

Grenades

7 enemies:

Slime Guy

Blue Guy

Demon Guy

Shotgun Guy

Machine Gun Guy

Grenadier Guy

Wizard Guy

...Each with their own boss variant which spawns in every 5 waves!

And last but not least, our radical protagonist,

Blik!

Are you a bad enough dude to get a high score?

Controls

WASD to move

Space to jump

1 2 3 4 5 to change weapons

Mouse to aim

Left click to shoot projectiles
